Five stars all around! We stayed in Glee for two weeks in May. Glee hotel was everything I expected and more. If you are looking for a place on the Lagos Island that is close to everything, such as, a great location for nightlife, shopping, relaxation, and that is also on a not so busy street, stay at the Glee. The hotel is very safe, and they have high security for anyone entering and exiting the building, this gave me such a relief! Booking a taxi out of the hotel was an exceptionally smooth process.
